flawed_nl_solution:
The kingfisher caught 13 + 7 = <<13+7=20>>20 fish.
The pelican and kingfisher caught 13 + 20 = <<13+20=36>>36 fish
The fisherman caught 3 x 36 = <<3*36=108>>108 fish
The fisherman caught 108 - 13 = <<108-13=95>>95 more fish than the pelican.
#### 95

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 33, not 36. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
